name: RED98
description:
How long can you survive?

A simple nostalgia-inducing bullet hell game made with the sprites of icons from Windows 98. Also includes the system sounds!

This is the first game I've ever uploaded, so let me know what you think of it! Made  with the free version of Clickteam Fusion 2.5 in three days.

This game idea has been on my mind for a while now and it's nice to see it finally alive and functional on the itch.io screen. I have plans to make another one of these, but styled with another old OS... maybe that of the Macintosh or Windows XP. 

bug fix 12/2/2020: no more crashes at the 20 second mark.
